bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Gitlab usernames can contain dots which breaks Polyaxon validations
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
Users using Gitlab to authenticate to Polyaxon might end up with a username containing a dot, e.g. foo.bar. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
The transformation part should detect this behavior and create a valid slug for Polyaxon.
